CHECKLIST_ITEM.8-1: Zkontroluj si v Portálu své známky, máš vše správně zapsané?
CHECKLIST_ITEM.8-3: Kontroluj svůj e-mail i poštu, aby ti neunikla pozvánka na zápis či jiná důležitá informace.
CHECKLIST_ITEM.9-1: JIS Card. Don’t forget arrange the JIS card ideally pair your JIS Card with the Pilsen Card to make full use of Pilsen’s public transit for less money.
CHECKLIST_ITEM.9-2: UWB Portal. Make sure, that you entered the correct mailing address, phone number and your bank account number into the Portal; apply for grants.
CHECKLIST_ITEM.10-1: Social grant. Did you apply for a social grant on the Portal? If so, submit all related documentation on the ICC as soon as possible.
CHECKLIST_ITEM.10-2: Excursion to the library. Throughout October, you have the chance to see all branches of the University Library, tours are planned for Mondays and Wednesdays, from 10 am to 1 pm.
CHECKLIST_ITEM.10-3: Going abroad? In the first half of October, there is an additional Erasmus+ competition for internships summer semester 2020/2021 and also preliminary round of the competitIon INTER-20 (freemovers) for semester trips summer semester 2020/2021.
CHECKLIST_ITEM.11-1: Check your e-mail, maybe matriculation is about you or maybe something important is written to you by a lecture.
CHECKLIST_ITEM.11-2: University vampire. Do a good deed and donate blood.
CHECKLIST_ITEM.11-3: Come to the meeting of the Scientific Council. November 18 is the rector's holiday and also a ceremonial meeting of the UWB Scientific Council, to which students are also cordially invited.
CHECKLIST_ITEM.12-1: Freemovers? In the first half of December, there is a first round of the competition INTER-20, so-called freemovers, for internships from January to the end of 2021.
CHECKLIST_ITEM.12-2: Courseware. Go through the materials for individual subjects, prepare for the exams.
CHECKLIST_ITEM.1-1: Check your grades on the Portal. Do you have everything correctly written?
CHECKLIST_ITEM.1-2: The payment date of grants. Do you have a bank account number written in the Portal? You better check it out, there is a    payment date in January
CHECKLIST_ITEM.1-3: Another chance to go abroad. The second round of the competition INTER-20, i.e. freemovers for semester trips winter semester 2021/2022, first round of competition Erasmus+ for internship in the acad year 2021/2022.
CHECKLIST_ITEM.2-3: Apply for the GRAS! As part of the grant support for student activities (GRAS) you can apply for funding for your project, the first application deadline is February.
CHECKLIST_ITEM.3-1: Do you already have a student ball ticket?
CHECKLIST_ITEM.3-2: Be culturally active! Our tip: Visit the One World film festival (Jeden svět)!
CHECKLIST_ITEM.3-3: Make an appointment in Kulturka or B-room. Or just chill out and have some coffee free there…
CHECKLIST_ITEM.4-1: Do you speak English? Or Russian? Check out UJP courses - American Center US Point and also the Russian Center run a conversation club.
CHECKLIST_ITEM.4-2: Don’t forget to apply for a dorm accommodation for the next year.
CHECKLIST_ITEM.4-3: To school by push scooter? Just register.
CHECKLIST_ITEM.5-1: Have you already confirmed your reservation for an accommodation in dormitories?
CHECKLIST_ITEM.5-3: Come on an Exodus march with friends.
CHECKLIST_ITEM.6-2: Pre - enrolment for another academic year.
